Name: Action Entities
About the game: A game with monsters in which there are 3 unique maps. Island (Night) - on this map, you need to fight off monsters or be a monster yourself and destroy the survivors. Planet nag - this map is in the style of team battle, capture the altars of nag to defeat the enemy. Ancient building - choose a character and go into battle, accumulate the most points in a given time by killing players and monsters.
